name: Disaster Mayhem (Smartkin, Tralexium)
description:
Game was made in Godot 3.2.2

Default controls:

Left/Right Arrows - Move around

Shift - Jump/Double jump

Made by Smartkin and Tralexium (Smart Lexium)

Programming - Smartkin

Art - Tralexium

Sound effects - Tralexium

Music - One Man Symphony Royalty Free https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/
